name: Zombie
lore: A zombie is the animated corpse of a creature raised by dark magic. Mindless and relentless, zombies obey their creator's commands without question. When left without orders, they attack any living creatures they encounter. Though slow and clumsy, zombies are dangerous in large numbers and notoriously difficult to destroy, as necrotic energy knits their rotting flesh back together even after devastating blows.

languages.notes: Understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the zombie drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Bludgeoning damage.
